rukus.text: yonado hananim-i bonaen seon jija jung han seonjijalo
geuneun han noyecheoleom gadeug sil-eun baelo dojuhayeo
jeomsul-eul deonjyeoss-euni geuga binan-eul bad-assdeola
geuttae keun gogiga geuleul samkyeo beolyeoss-euni ineun geuui binanbad-eul haeng wi ttaemun-ieossnola
hananimkke yeong-gwang-i iss-eusoseo lago geuga hoegaehaji anihaessdamyeon
geuneun bunmyeong geu mulgogi baes-sog e buhwal-ui geunalkkaji iss-eoss-eulila
hananim-i geuleul bulmoui haebyeon-eulo gujehani geuneun byeongdeul-eo iss-eoss deola
hananim-eun jolongbag namuga geu ui wilo jalage hayeossnola
hananim-i sibmanmyeong isang-ui baeg seongdeul-ege geuleul bonaessdeoni
geudeul-i mid-eum-eul gagyeossdeola geulihayeo hananim-eun geudeul-ege jamsidong-an geudeul-ui salm-eul jeulgidolog heolaghayeossnola
geudaeui junim-egeneun ttaldeulman issgo geudeul-egeneun adeulman issneunji mul-eobola
animyeon hananim-i cheonsaleul yeo seong-eulo changjohan geos-eul geudeul-i moggyeog ilado haessneunyo
sillo geudeul-i malhaneun geos-eun kkumyeonaen geos-e bulgwahanila
hananimkkeseo jason-eul nahneunda hani geudeul-eun geojishaneun jadeul-ila
hananimkkeseo adeulboda ttaldeul eul seontaeghaessdan mal-inyo
eotteon iyulo geuleohge pandanha neunyo
neohuineun gyohun-eul badji anihaess deonyo
animyeon neohuiga eotteon bunmyeonghan gwonneung-ilado issdan mal-inyo
neohuiga jinsil-ilamyeon gwonneung-eul ibjunghaneun neohuiui seongseoleul gajyeoola
geudeul-eun hananimgwa yeongma sai ga hyeol-yeongwangyelago kkumyeodaedeola geu leona yeongmadeul-eun jasindeul-i hananim ap-e seoji anihamyeon anidoem-eul jal algo issnola
geudeul-i myosahan geosgwaneun gwangye ga eobs-eusin hananimkke yeong-gwang-i iss-eu soseo
geuleona seongsilhan hananim-ui jong deul-eun geuleohji ani hanila
neohuiwa geuligo neohuiga sungbae haneun usangdeul-eun
eoneu nugudo hananim-e gwanha yeo yuhoghal su eobsnola
geuleona seuseulo taoleuneun bul jiog-eulo ganeun janeun je-oela
jueojin immuga issneun ulineun eoneu nugudo geuleohji anihamyeo
ulineun jul-eul jieo
hananim-eul chanmihaneun jadeul-ila
geuleona geuleohge malhaneun jadeul-eun
seonjodeullobuteo uliege me sejiga iss-eossdamyeon
sillo ulineun seongsilhan hananim-ui jongdeul-i doeeoss-eulila
ie kkulan-i wass-euna geudeul-eungeoyeoghayeoss-euni geudeul-eun god alge doe lila
hananim-ui malsseum-eun geubun-ui jongdeul-eul tonghayeo imi jeonhayeo jyeoss-euni
geudeul-eun sillo seunglihalila
geuligo hananim-ui gundaeneun jeongbog-eul hal geos-ini
jamsi dong-an geudeullobuteo tteol-eojyeo
geudeul-eul jikyeobola geudeuldo jikyeo bolila
geudeul-eun hananim-ui beol-eul seodulleo guham-inyo
geuleona beol-i geudeul-ui neolb-eun tteul-e ileuni gyeong-gobadgo juuihaji anihan saaghan jadeul-ui achim-i bi cheonhadeola
geuleomeulo jamsi dong-an geudeullobuteo tteol-eojyeo
geudeul-eul jikyeobola geudeuldo jikyeobolila
yeong-gwang-gwa gwonneung-eulo chungmanhan geudaeui junim-eul chan-yanghala geubun-eun geu deul-i myosahan geosgwaneun gwangyega eobsno la
seonjijadeul wie pyeong-an-i iss-eulgeos-ila
man-yuui junim-isin hananim-i yeo chanmileul bad-eusoseo
